trans.title: Mass production body welding positions and numbers (Wheelhouse upper member and front damper extension)

item.ptxt: Welding symbols (The welding symbols with dashed lines have a meaning of the spot welding of the part which is not visible)
and : 2-Plate spot welding; and : 3-Plate spot welding; and : 4-Plate spot welding; : MAG plug welding; : MAG welding L=Welding length; unit: mm (in)

trans.title: Mass production body welding positions and numbers (Side frame gusset, gusset plate, and damper housing set)

item.ptxt: Welding symbols (The welding symbols with dashed lines have a meaning of the spot welding of the part which is not visible)
and : 2-Plate spot welding; and : 3-Plate spot welding; and : 4-Plate spot welding; : MAG plug welding; : MAG welding L=Welding length; unit: mm (in)
This section explains the procedures after removal of all related parts. For the related parts' removal procedure, refer to the appropriate Shop Manual.
The component replacement procedure described here is only for new Honda-supplied parts, as needed, according to the area and the degree of damage on the body.
Remove the wheelhouse upper member, and replace the wheelhouse lower member, the wheelhouse lower extension, and the damper extension as an assembly.
If necessary, leave the front side backplate in place, and replace the side frame gusset and the gusset plate at the same time.

Left side: When removing the side frame gusset, in order to drill the welded positions [X] at the joint for the side frame gusset and the front side backplate under the front side frame, remove the gusset plate, and drill the two welded points from under the side frame gusset.
This section explains the procedures after removal of all related parts. For the related parts' removal procedure, refer to the appropriate Shop Manual.
The component replacement procedure described here is only for new Honda-supplied parts, as needed, according to the area and the degree of damage on the body.
Check the damper housing position for damage. If necessary, replace it.
When removing the damper housing set, drill the seven welded points [Y] at the joint for the damper base and the dashboard upper from under the damper base.
